Constructor Detail

Sprite

public Sprite( std::string imageRef, int x = 0, int y = 0, int w = 0, int h = 0 );
Constructor
Parameters:
spriteName - The name of the sprite.
x - The initial x coordinate of the sprite
y - The initial y coordinate of the sprite
w - The initial width of the sprite in pixels
h - The initial height of the sprite in pixels

Default Constructor

Draw

public void Draw( BITMAP* frame, BITMAP* buffer );
Draws the sprite in its current location.
Parameters:
image - The sprite image being drawn
dest - The screen bitmap on which to draw the sprite

isAlive

 bool isAlive();
Returns:
true if the sprite is being drawn, false otherwise

isAnimating

 bool isAnimating();
Returns:
true if the sprite is being animated, false otherwise

public bool isColliding( Sprite& other_sprite );

public bool isVisible();

MoveTo

public void MoveTo( int x, int y, int s );
Sets a sprite in motion until it reaches its destination.
Parameters:
x - The x coordinate being moved to
y - The y coordinate being moved to
speed - The number of pixels to move per tick (0 to stop movement)

SetAlive

public void SetAlive( bool val );
Toggles whether or not the sprite is alive.
Parameters:
val - true to have the sprite drawn, false to have it not drawn

SetAnimation

public void SetAnimation( int delay = 0 );
Toggles animation of the sprite and sets the frame rate
Parameters:
delay - The number of ticks to wait before moving to the next frame. Higher numbers yield slower animations. 0 or less will turn animation off.

SetFrame

public void SetFrame( int frame );
Sets the current animation frame to draw.
Parameters:
frame - The index of the frame to draw
Returns:
true if the frame index is valid, false otherwise.

SetFrameCount

public void SetFrameCount( int fCount );

SetFrameDelay

public void SetFrameDelay( int delay );
Sets the rate at which to animate the sprite
Parameters:
delay - The number of ticks to wait before moving to the next frame. Higher numbers yield slower animations. 0 will turn animation off.

SetPosition

public void SetPosition( int x, int y );
Sets the position of the sprite on the screen.
Parameters:
x - The x coordinate of the position
y - The y coordinate of the position

SetSize

public void SetSize( int w, int h );
Sets the width and height of the sprite.
Parameters:
w - The width of the sprite
h - The height of the sprite

SetVisible

public void SetVisible( bool in );

Update

public void Update();
Updates the sprite's location and animation.
Parameters:
img - The sprite image being drawn
dest - The screen bitmap on which to draw the sprite
